qas.question: What percent of the population has completed non-mandatory upper secondary education?
What percent of the population has completed additionaly higher education?
The majority of the population to finish tertiary schooling in bern are what people?

context: In Bern, about 50,418 or (<a0_0>39.2%<a0_0/>) of the population have completed non-mandatory upper secondary education, and 24,311 or (<a1_0>18.9%<a1_0/>) have completed additional higher education (either university or a Fachhochschule). Of the 24,311 who completed tertiary schooling, 51.6% were <a2_0>Swiss men<a2_0/>, 33.0% were Swiss women, 8.9% were non-Swiss men and 6.5% were non-Swiss women.
